amendment.description: Relating to the partnership security capacity of foreign military and security forces and security and stabilization assistance.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2432 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2432 proposed by Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S12395-12396; text: CR S12396) Relating to the partnership security capacity of foreign military and security forces and security and stabilization assistance.
